revised_title: The Medicinal Effects of Poisonous Plants: A Case Study
tldr: This article discusses a case study of a man suffering from a skin condition who was treated with the juice of a poisonous plant instead of water parsnip. The patient experienced significant improvement in his condition after consuming the juice, despite its unpleasant side effects. The author, Richard Pulteney, shares this narrative as a fact without offering any reasoning or conclusions.
